content:
# Now that I have moved to the Coal position, I will proceed to harvest some Coal.
# I will collect a quantity of 10 Coal to ensure I have enough for fueling the Stone Furnace.

harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 Coal from the nearest patch.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the updated inventory after harvesting.
